quote: We cannot control the evil tongues of others; but a good life enables us to disregard them.
Ideas control the world.
A journey is like marriage. The certain way to be wrong is to think you control it.
Anger is a great force. If you control it, it can be transmuted into a power which can move the whole world.
Anger is a momentary madness, so control your passion or it will control you.
We cannot control the evil tongues of others; but a good life enables us to disregard them.
Ideas control the world.
A journey is like marriage. The certain way to be wrong is to think you control it.
Anger is a great force. If you control it, it can be transmuted into a power which can move the whole world.
Anger is a momentary madness, so control your passion or it will control you.
Bad leaders believe that they have to project control at all times.
Be modest, humble, simple. Control your anger.
Being competent means the ability to control and operate the things in the environment and the environment itself.
Circumstances are beyond human control, but our conduct is in our own power.
Concern should drive us into action and not into a depression. No man is free who cannot control himself.
Control is the source of strategic power.
Control your own destiny or someone else will.
Do not let circumstances control you. You change your circumstances.
Do what you fear most and you control fear.
Goals allow you to control the direction of change in your favor.
Honesty is a good thing, but it is not profitable to its possessor unless it is kept under control.
I cannot trust a man to control others who cannot control himself.
I don't control my writing - it controls me.
I'm all in favour of free expression provided it's kept rigidly under control.
I've always wanted to own and control the primary technology in everything we do.
If you understand the universe, you control it, in a way.
If you're yelling you're the one who's lost control of the conversation.
Immense power is acquired by assuring yourself in your secret reveries that you were born to control affairs.
Luck is being in the right place at the right time, but location and timing are to some extent under our control.
My definition of success is control.
Of the events of life we may have some control. but over the law of its progress none.
One ought to hold on to one's heart; for if one lets it go, one soon loses control of the head too.
One thing you cannot control is nature.

Power in America today is control of the means of communication.
Television is the most perfect democracy. You sit there with your remote control and vote.
The American people have no control over what the military does. We have no say in American foreign policy.
The highest possible stage in moral culture is when we recognize that we ought to control our thoughts.
The most exciting happiness is the happiness generated by forces beyond your control.

The sign of an intelligent people is their ability to control emotions by the application of reason.

There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.

To enjoy freedom we have to control ourselves.

Virtue does not consist in the absence of the passions, but in the control of them.
We feel good about ourselves to the exact degree we feel in control of our lives.
We gain our ends only with the laws of nature; we control her only by understanding her laws.
What I'd really like to control is not machines, but people.
You cannot always control what goes on outside. But you can always control what goes on inside.
